questions.question_text: The formula editor may be used all of the following places EXCEPT:

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
The correct answer is:

A. S-Control

The formula editor in Salesforce is used for creating and editing formulas in places like Formula Fields, Validation Rules, and Default Values on Standard or Custom Fields. However, S-Controls (deprecated in favor of Visualforce and Lightning Components) do not utilize the formula editor. S-Controls were custom web-based code elements and required manual coding, not formulas.
Should the question be phrased as "The formula editor may be used IN all of the following places EXCEPT:" ?

questions.question_text: When you have exceeded your general storage limit, you can use your complimentary document storage for additional space.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Salesforce will send your administrator a warning email when you hit the storage cap that says you need to either: 
- Clean up your instance by deleting files and/or data. 
- Purchase more storage
